auth_sentence.content: Our prescious planet really is not a fragile planet, after all, nor a particularly delicate planet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our prescious planet really is not a fragile planet, after all, nor a particularly delicate planet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our prescious planet really is not a fragile planet, after all, nor a particularly delicate planet.

auth_sentence.content: Why are we spending so many of our prescious tax dollars to track and surveil our own people?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why are we spending so many of our prescious tax dollars to track and surveil our own people?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why are we spending so many of our prescious tax dollars to track and surveil our own people?
